home.cta_text: Front Row is a next-generation NFT platform that fosters real community while connecting you like never before to your favorite celebrities and icons.

whitepaper.title: Take a sneak peak at the first truly social NFT platform
whitepaper.subtitle: See Whitepaper for more

benefits.title: An Opportunity For Insiders
benefits.text: The FRR Pool™  allows participating Front Row token holders to generate industry‑leading returns* from a tried-and-true inventory financing model. All loans are fully collateralized with real-world inventory, essentially eliminating risk.
benefits.asterisk: *Up to 20% based on historical average returns.

who.title: Who We Are
who.text: Front Row has years of proven success with its inventory financing model, which is a responsibility of the FRR Retail division. The company’s subsidiaries span a wide range of industries and capabilities and are even listed on South Korea’s major stock exchange.
who.onepager: More details available in our One Pager

risk.title: DeFi and Investor Safety
risk.text: Decentralized Finance (DeFi) technology introduces a new level of security and efficiency to an already-working lending model. The result is higher returns and lower risk, automated and protected by smart contracts and decentralization.
risk.security_text: The FRR Pool is a smart contract that automates payouts to Front Row holders and is fully guaranteed by the Liquidity Reserve.
risk.collateral_text: All loans are fully collateralized by real-world inventory that can be sold through partnerships with South Korea’s largest TV shopping networks.
risk.performance_text: Front Row is a major corporation with key partnerships and diverse international capabilities, resulting in years of success with this model.

token.title: Token Allocation
lock_items: Defi Loan & Reward pool: 5% unlocked on Month 0 and 5% unlocks each month from Month 11
Ecosystem: 5 % unlocks each month from Month 35
Foundation Reserve: 5% unlocks each month from Month 35
Team, Advisors & Partners: 5% unlocks each month Month 11
Marketing: 5% unlocked on Month 0 and 5% unlocks each month from Month 11
Token Sales (Private): 5% unlocks each week from Month 0 for private investors
Token Sales (Public): no lock for public investors (total tokens limited to 0.08% of the total supply)

team.title: Team
team.tpa_text: Chairman of the Board of Directors at isMedia TPA Retail Co. U.S. Corporate head. Former co-founder of One holdings group. Investor of Salk Institute via Nanos Co. Ltd.
team.ismedia_text: Former CFO, YNG Company. Former CEO, Eduplanet. Former Director, Korea Culture and Tourism Institute. Former Managing Director, Tubeasset America.
team.cfo_text: Chairman of the Board of Directors at TPA Group. Former Division Director at KTB Investment & Securities Co., Ltd. Former General Manager at KWOOM Securities Co. Ltd.

items.title: Why Front Row?
items.text: The FRR token allows holders to participate in an existing and successful inventory financing model managed by Front Row, a publicly-traded distribution company founded in South Korea. All interest revenues generated by the inventory financing model will be automatically distributed as dividends via smart contract to FRR token holders who stake their tokens into the FRR pool. All loans are backed by inventory as collateral and the pool is guaranteed by the Liquidity Reserve smart contract, ensuring holders will never experience withdrawal problems or business interruptions. Prospective investment returns based on Front Row’s historical earnings on inventory financing are 16-24%.

items.title: What happens if a loan defaults?
What NFTs will be offered on the platform?
items.text: The platform will be unique in its offerings, particularly in the strength of its entertainment and game-industry NFTs. Major entertainment companies SM Entertainment and P Nation will pursue a joint venture with isMedia in order to offer exclusive NFTs offered by globally-recognized K-pop celebrities and more. Further partnerships will continue to be announced.

items.title: Will the platform accept credit card?
items.text: Yes. In order to be accessible to a mainstream audience and grow the platform to the next level, isMedia has partnered with a major credit card processing provider in order to accept credit card payments on the platform.
